attributes.action: have the salary of Members of Parliament set by the National Federation of Old Age Pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs seem to beat themselves with ashes when conducting the onerous duty of deciding their own pay. They often err on the side of caution (i.e. generosity), being out of touch with the Real World. 

Let those who are affected by the decisions made by MPs decide the pay and allowances... and what better group than a Committee drawn from the National Federation of Old Age Pensioners?  It would concentrate the minds of MPs somewhat,  when deciding the level of the Old Age Pension... currently, UK has one of the lowest OAP pension rates.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
